original_title: Ich will nicht wissen, wer ich bin - Heiner M端ller
overview: This film not only illuminates Heiner M端ller's life and works, it is more about questioning the "Sphinx" of the East and its saying about the loss of utopias and examining whether Heiner M端ller's texts, as he himself said, were messages in a bottle for the future or not.
title: Ich will nicht wissen, wer ich bin - Heiner M端ller
